title: What to watch : 10 shows premiering in February
body_text:
Features & Interviews Social Pics of the Day Things to Know Profiles Message Boards Shows Listing
ABC/Jose Alvarado, Jr.
Jenna Johnson reveals what she wants to change about 'Dancing with the Stars'
Dancing with the Stars pro Jenna Johnson has revealed the one thing she wishes producers would bring back to the ABC reality dancing competition for Season 35.
- 'The Bachelor' couple Jason Mesnick and Molly Malaney reveal how they beat the odds
The Bachelor couple Jason Mesnick and Molly Malaney have shared their secret to a long-lasting relationship post-show. - 'The Bachelorette' alum Ali Fedotowsky gets candid about Botox and plastic surgery
The Bachelorette alum Ali Fedotowsky has opened up about how she's maintained her youthful appearance. - 'Love Is Blind' creator explains why Vic and Christine got a private getaway to Malibu
Love Is Blind creator Chris Coelen has explained why one lucky couple got to fly to Malibu alone after getting engaged while all of the other Season 10 couples went to Mexico. - 'The Real Housewives' alum Taylor Armstrong apologizes for slamming Bad Bunny's Super Bowl performance
The Real Housewives of Beverly Hills alum Taylor Armstrong has apologized for her inflammatory comments about Bad Bunny's Super Bowl halftime performance. - Emma Slater honors former 'Dancing with the Stars' partner James Van Der Beek after his death at 48
Emma Slater has paid tribute to former Dancing with the Stars partner, Dawson's Creek star James Van Der Beek, following his death at age 48. - 'Rehab Addict' canceled by HGTV after Nicole Curtis used racial slur while filming
Rehab Addict has been canceled by HGTV after its star Nicole Curtis was caught using a racial slur while filming the show. - 'The Golden Bachelor' alum Cindy Cullers blasts Peg Munson -- She's a "bully" who tried to "lay evil" on others
The Golden Bachelor alum Cindy Angelcyk Cullers has accused Mel Owens' winner, Peg Munson, of being a "bully" and trying to bring "evil" into the lives of their fellow Season 2 bachelorettes. - 'Farmer Wants a Wife's Season 4 bachelors and premiere date announced by Fox
Farmer Wants a Wife's Season 4 bachelors and premiere date have been announced. - Kat Izzo soft launches new relationship after Dale Moss split
The Bachelor alum Katherine "Kat" Izzo has soft launched her new relationship on social media following her split from her Bachelor in Paradise co-star Dale Moss. - 'Southern Charm' alum Cameran Eubanks sets record straight on rumored spinoff with Chelsea Meissner and Naomie Olindo
Southern Charm alum Cameran Eubanks has addressed rumors she's going to be starring in a spinoff with friends Chelsea Meissner and Naomie Olindo. -

The Bachelor alum Daisy Kent has shared a wedding update on her dress, bridal shower and more. - Jill Zarin dropped from E!'s 'The Real Housewives' reunion show 'The Golden Life'
Jill Zarin has been fired from The Real Housewives of New York City's reunion show, The Golden Life, after making racially-insensitive complaints about Bad Bunny's Super Bowl halftime show. - Robert Irwin addresses rumors he could be next 'The Bachelor' star
Dancing with the Stars' Season 34 winner Robert Irwin has addressed speculation he very possibly could be the next The Bachelor star. - Andy Cohen shares how he really feels about 'The Real Housewives of NYC' alums leaving Bravo for E!
Andy Cohen has revealed what he thinks about several of The Real Housewives of New York City cast members leaving Bravo for a new E! series. - 'The Bachelorette' alum Kaitlyn Bristowe gets candid about having "the most epic breakdown"
The Bachelorette alum Kaitlyn Bristowe has apparently suffered a breakdown of epic proportions. - '90 Day Fiance' star Chloe Fabiano set the record straight on Luke Berry relationship
90 Day Fiance: The Other Way star Chloe Fabiano has set the record straight on her relationship with Luke Berry after they appeared to have chemistry at the Season 7 reunion. - 'Dancing with the Stars' announces first-ever fan convention
Dancing with the Stars has announced its first-ever convention for fans called "Dancing with the Stars Con 2026" this summer. - 'Survivor' host Jeff Probst teases what's next after Season 50
Survivor host Jeff Probst has hinted what CBS may have in store for fans after its milestone 50th season. - Taylor Frankie Paul questions if she's "worthy of love" in first 'The Bachelorette' Season 22 promo
Taylor Frankie Paul has questioned if she's "worthy of love" in the first promo ABC dropped for The Bachelorette's upcoming 22nd season. - 'Big Brother' alum Katherine Woodman seemingly confirms breakup from Rylie Jeffries
Big Brother alum Katherine Woodman has appeared to confirm her split from Rylie Jeffries, the controversial cowboy from Season 27, after six months together. -

Clare Crawley has explained why she chose not to participate in The Bachelorette: Before the First Rose reunion special. - '90 Day Fiance' alum Liz Woods shares "heartbreaking" cancer update
90 Day Fiance alum Liz Woods has shared that she's not cancer free in a new health update. - 'The Bachelor' alum Litia Garr addresses Juliana Pasquarosa being "mortified" over her Grant Ellis sex claim
The Bachelor alum Litia Garr has responded to Juliana Pasquarosa's confession she was "mortified" that Litia insinuated Grant Ellis picked her because she had slept with him in the Fantasy Suite. - 'The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' star Layla Taylor confirms breakup with Mason McWhorter
The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives star Layla Taylor has announced that her relationship with boyfriend Mason McWhorter is over. - 'Bachelor in Paradise' couple Bailey Taylor Brown and Jeremy Simon share relationship update
Bachelor in Paradise couple Bailey Taylor Brown and Jeremy Simon have revealed where they stand in their relationship and what's next for them. - Mike White hoped to make 'The White Lotus' alliance on 'Survivor 50'
Mike White has revealed he'd hoped to align with his former Survivor Season 37 castmates Christian Hubicki and Angelina Keeley and create a special The White Lotus alliance while competing on Survivor 50. - 'The Bachelorette' alum Charity Lawson spills wedding dress details and more
The Bachelorette alum Charity Lawson has dished some specifics about her wedding dress for when she marries fiance Dotun Olubeko. - Trista Rehn defends Taylor Frankie Paul's 'The Bachelorette' casting
The OG Bachelorette, Trista Rehn, has shared how she feels about Taylor Frankie Paul's casting on The Bachelorette's upcoming 22nd season. - Whitney Leavitt hints she may exit 'The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' after Season 5
Whitney Leavitt has shared that she may not return to The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives after Season 5. - '90 Day Fiance: The Other Way' star Chloe Fabiano reveals more about her sugardaddy
90 Day Fiance: The Other Way star Chloe Fabiano has opened up about her "sugardaddy," who was apparently sending her money when she was still dating Johny Fernandes. - Chris Harrison to host new "traditional marriage" dating show in first TV gig since 'The Bachelor'
Nearly five years after Chris Harrison parted ways with ABC's The Bachelor, it appears he's coming back into the spotlight. - 'The Real Housewives of Rhode Island' premiere date announced by Bravo
The Real Housewives of Rhode Island finally has a premiere date. - 'The Bachelor' alum Nick Viall and wife Natalie Joy expecting "rainbow" twins after miscarriages
The Bachelor alum Nick Viall has announced that he and wife Natalie Joy are expanding their family -- and fast! - '90 Day Fiance' star Chloe shares new details about Johny's new girlfriend and upcoming baby
Chloe Fabiano has shared new details about Johny Fernandes' new girlfriend and baby on the way. - 'The Bachelorette' alums reunion to air on ABC before Taylor Frankie Paul's Season 22 premiere
Taylor Frankie Paul will be joining over a dozen former The Bachelorette stars for a big televised reunion prior to the premiere of her season. - Demi Engemann absent from Whitney Leavitt's Broadway debut amid rumors she's done with 'Mormon Wives'
Demi Engemann did not attend co-star Whitney Leavitt's Broadway debut amid rumors she won't be returning for The Secret Lives of Mormon Wives' fourth season. - '90 Day Fiance' couple Pattiya Phillips and Dylan Yeandle share relationship update
90 Day Fiance: The Other Way Season 7 couple Pattiya Phillips and Dylan Yeandle have shared where they currently stand in their relationship. - 'The Bachelorette' star Taylor Frankie Paul shares mental health struggle therapies
The Bachelorette star Taylor Frankie Paul has opened up about how she conquers mental health struggles. - Hayley Erbert reveals if she wants to return to 'Dancing with the Stars'
Hayley Erbert has revealed whether she has any plans to return to Dancing with the Stars, which just wrapped its 34th season late last year. - 'The Bachelor' alum Sydney Lotuaco reveals gender of second child
The Bachelor alum Sydney Lotuaco has revealed whether she has a baby boy or girl on the way with husband Nick Wehby. - 'The Real Housewives of New York City' alums to reunite for new 'The Golden Life' show on E!
A handful of iconic The Real Housewives of New York City cast members will be reuniting for a brand new show on E!. - Shaunie Henderson announces the end of 'Basketball Wives' after 12 seasons
Shaunie Henderson has announced the end of Basketball Wives after 12 seasons and 15 years on the air. - 'Big Brother' alum Claire Rehfuss addresses rumor Derek Xiao cheated on her
Big Brother and The Amazing Race alum Claire Rehfuss has addressed rumors Derek Xiao cheated on her when they were still together. - '90 Day Fiance: The Other Way' Tell All: Johny drops "a bomb," Madelein dumps Luke, Dylan and Pattiya reveal K-1 visa plan
90 Day Fiance: The Other Way's Tell All featured Johny revealing he's expecting a baby, Madelein dumping Luke after a K-1 visa approval, Dylan and Pattiya revealing big plans, and Manon begging Anthony not to divorce her during Part 2 that aired Monday night on TLC.
